pageContext.claim: “I built a great company, but I'm not involved with Russia. I have had dealings over the years where I sold a house to a very wealthy Russian many years ago. I had the Miss Universe pageant, which I owned for quite a while. I had it in Moscow a long time ago. But other than that, I have nothing to do with Russia.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump signed a nonbinding agreement in the fall of 2015 to pursue a deal for Trump Moscow. He was continually updated on the project even while he publically denied he didn't have any business ties to Russia. Court documents say the deal was still in progress until just before the Republican National Convention.
